summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6182 for the improvement of 34th Avenue West from McCord Place to Gilman Avenue; and certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 87130, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
